item.title: HITMAN World of Assassination Elusive Target mission ‘Eminem vs. Slim Shady’ launches December 1
item.content:encoded:
IO Interactive has announced HITMAN World of Assassination limited-time Elusive Target mission “Eminem vs. Slim Shady,” which will be available for free from December 1 to 31.

Here are the details:

Eminem vs. Slim Shady: Playable for free starting December 1

Rap icon Eminem joins HITMAN World of Assassination both as himself and his twisted alter ego, Slim Shady. In his latest album, “The Death of Slim Shady,” the rapper attempted to put his other self away, but now Eminem recruits the legendary assassin Agent 47 to put his past away permanently. In a surreal new mission crafted by Eminem in collaboration with IO Interactive and creative director / producer Paul Rosenberg, the level is packed with dreamlike twists that mirror Slim Shady’s unhinged reality. Operatives find themselves in a medical facility in Hokkaido that has been twisted into the Popsomp Hills Asylum. Agent 47 will have to track Slim Shady across multiple areas, such as his broadcasting studio, to take him out without being detected. There are abundant Eminem references in the mission from throughout the rapper’s discography, such as a poisoned plate of the iconic Mom’s Spaghetti and a performance of “Houdini.”

The Season of Eminem vs. Slim Shady: Live Updates, Free for HITMAN World of Assassination Players

A new roadmap will start with the Season of Eminem vs. Slim Shady set to bring new content to players, in addition to the new Elusive Target. Players will be able to face two new challenges, two new Featured Contracts batches, as well as three returning Elusive Targets, including The Splitter featuring Jean-Claude Van Damme, and two returning events: Holiday Hoarders and Hokkaido Snow Festival. Two new Twitch Drops will be available to redeem, with the Bomb-Ass Dynamite, and the Solstice Suit, which can be earned by watching thirty minutes of HITMAN World of Assassination on Twitch during specific time periods.

  • ❮
  • ❯

HITMAN World of Assassination Coming to New Platforms

Alongside the new Elusive Target, IO Interactive announced today that HITMAN World of Assassination will be launching on the ROG XBOX Ally X and ROG XBOX Ally on December 1. The new Elusive Target mission featuring Eminem vs. Slim Shady will be playable day one on these new devices. The game will also be an Xbox Play Anywhere title, allowing players to enjoy seamless play across Xbox consoles and Microsoft PC with shared progress and achievements.

HITMAN World of Assassination is available now for PlayStation 5 with PlayStation VR2 support, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch via cloud streaming, PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, and iOS.

Watch a new trailer below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

Eminem vs. Slim Shady Elusive Target Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/hitman-world-of-assassination-elusive-target-mission-eminem-vs-slim-shady-launches-december-1

item.title: Wild West open-world roguelike action game Erosion announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out in Early Access for Xbox Series and PC in spring 2026.

Publisher Lyrical Games and The Last Case of Benedict Fox developer Plot Twist have announced Erosion, a Wild West open-world roguelike action game. It will launch in Early Access for Xbox Series and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store in spring 2026, followed by a full release across PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC later in 2026.

“We founded Plot Twist with the intention of making story-driven independent titles fueled by compelling gameplay,” said Plot Twist CEO Tomasz Gawlikowski in a press release. “Every time you die in Erosion‘s bullet frenzy battles, you can come back, but several years will have passed for the world around you. This lends the story and action a unique emotional depth, making saving your daughter all the more emotional. We can’t wait for players to experience all of this.”

Lyrical Games head Blake Rochkind added, “At Lyrical Games, we are looking to work with ambitious developers. When we understood the breadth of experience Plot Twist had in mind for Erosion, alongside the incredible visual and unique tone, we knew we had to support their vision.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

About

In Erosion, players find themselves in a distant future where a mysterious, sentient rock formation called the Pillar is consuming civilization piece by piece. They will descend into the mysterious Pillar to battle through chaotic, fully destructible dungeons, fighting to get one step closer to saving the protagonist’s daughter or losing her entirely to time itself. Every decision changes the story, and every death takes time off the clock.

Erosion challenges players with intense, fast-paced combat as they delve into roguelite dungeons filled with enemies and bosses while harnessing powerful perks and skills. Players will explore a post-apocalyptic Wild West in customizable vehicles, unravel side stories that reshape the future, and leave their mark on a highly destructible, voxel-based world.

Key Features

  • Experience Every Possible Future – Die in a dungeon? Wake up ten years later. That peaceful farm is now a cultist compound worshipping the Great Ol’ Rooster. That store owner you helped? They’ve built an empire. Your choices permeate across decades, transforming factions, townsfolk, and entire regions. Once you’ve mastered full timeline control you can rewrite every possible future.
  • Explore an Open World – Explore a massive wasteland overworld where you can join a cult, steal a slick new ride, and gamble your hard-earned Cheddar away at the Al Cashino. Go sand fishing for buried creatures, hunt bounties, try your luck in duels, or just race trucks through the salt flats. Complete quests to unlock permanent upgrades and reshape the future.
  • Endless Ways to Cause Problems – Collect dozens of weapons from ritual bows that draw their strength from your blood, to homing smart guns, to the legendary Ebony Rooster that shoots bouncy eggs. Experiment with 100+ skills and modifiers to create absurd synergies. Command an army of cats. Deploy orbital turrets. Clone yourself. The build possibilities are endless.
  • Break Everything – Destructible voxel environments mean cover is temporary and collateral damage is guaranteed. Blow up walls, turn locations into rubble, and flip the poker table! Physics-driven destruction meets bullet-hell combat for that sweet, sweet emergent mayhem.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/wild-west-open-world-roguelike-action-game-erosion-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

item.title: 007 First Light reveals Aston Martin Valhalla supercar
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Aston Martin's first-ever mid-engine plug-in supercar.

IO Interactive has released a new trailer for 007 First Light revealing the Aston Martin Valhalla supercar will be featured in the game.

“The reveal of Valhalla in 007 First Light marks one of the many steps our team is taking to honor the iconic cars that define the Bond legacy,” said IO Interactive CEO Hakan Abrak in a press release. “Cars have always been at the core of the James Bond experience, reflecting his style, ingenuity, and daring personality. With the debut of Valhalla, players will encounter a machine that embodies that spirit, capturing the excitement of Bond’s world and the timeless elegance of his vehicles.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here are the latest details:

Designed for precision, power, and unmistakable elegance, the Aston Martin’s Valhalla stands as a symbol of innovation within Bond’s world. In 007 First Light, players get an up-close look at this remarkable supercar with hypercar performance, where cutting-edge technology meets the timeless luxury of the Bond franchise. Infused with advanced Formula 1 engineering, Valhalla embodies aerodynamic mastery, striking form, and exquisite detailing. Limited to just 999 units worldwide, the supercar sets the standard for automotive innovation, aiding players in one of Bond’s high-stakes missions in 007 First Light.

In the world of James Bond, cars have always been more than vehicles, embodying style, sophistication, and state-of-the-art technology that define the iconic 007 experience. This legacy is honored in 007 First Light, showcasing a long-running collection of iconic Bond vehicles for players to see and experience up close. Among them, the Aston Martin Valhalla makes its in-game debut, delivering unmatched style and excitement.

Alongside the reveal of the Aston Martin Valhalla, IO Interactive announced that 007 First Light will be available on the ROG Xbox Ally X and ROG Xbox Ally at launch, bringing the reimagined Bond origin story to handheld players. The game will also be an Xbox Play Anywhere title, allowing players to enjoy seamless play across Xbox consoles and Windows PC with shared progress and achievements. Whether at home or on the go, players will be able to play as James Bond, as he takes his first step into the world of espionage in 007 First Light.

007 First Light is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on March 27, 2026.

Watch the reveal trailer below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

Aston Martin Valhalla Reveal Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/007-first-light-reveals-aston-martin-valhalla-supercar

item.title: Tides of Annihilation ‘Break the Mirror’ gameplay trailer, screenshots
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

A look at the mystifying realm of Avalon.

Eclipse Glow Games has released a new gameplay trailer and screenshots for Arthurian legend-inspired fantasy action adventure game Tides of Annihilation dubbed “Break the Mirror.”

“We’ve created a world that reimagines Arthurian Legend where themes of courage, loyalty, and heroism intertwine with an epic story set in a strange-yet-familiar setting that will test the mettle of true gamers and push the genre forward,” said Kun Fu, Lead Game Producer at Eclipse Glow Games. “We are thrilled to share the next chapter of Gwendolyn’s journey, and this is only the beginning.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here are the latest details:

  • What is Tides of Annihilation?
    • Tides of Annihilation is an action adventure game set in a modern-day, invasion-fractured London and mysterious otherworld realm, where the lone survivor, Gwendolyn, seeks the Holy Grail to rescue her sister and restore the world.
  • Who are the main characters featured in this new trailer?
    • The trailer features Gwendolyn, the main character in the game. She faces off against the powerful shape-shifting witch Tyronoe and is assisted by spear-wielding Sir Lamorak, a Knight of the Roundtable.
  • What is the story behind this new Tides of Annihilation Trailer?
    • As Gwendolyn continues her quest to rescue her sister and restore humanity, she will encounter different stories and conflicts behind Knights of the Roundtable and the evils behind this otherworldly invasion. This includes uncovering the truth behind Sir Lamorak, whose suffering is caused by the witch Tyronoe. This leads Gwendolyn to the church ruins where the fight takes place with Tyronoe.
  • When Lamarok comes to help the main character Gwendolyn, it looks like the player is able to control Lamorak. Is this a new part to the Knights system in the game?
    • One of the key unique features of the game is the Knights System where Gwendolyn can summon and command spectral knights to attack during battle. Part of this Knights System is being revealed for the first time in the new trailer called the Dual Frontline Battle System. This system shows the ability to control both Gwendolyn and Lamorak to simultaneously attack Tyronoe and break down her magical barriers.
  • How many Knights will be featured in the game and will we see other named Knights of the Roundtable like Gawain or Lancelot?
    • Through her quest for the Holy Grail, Gwendolyn will be able to find several knights to summon and command in the game, including notable Knights of the Roundtable from Arthurian mythology. More details including the number and names of Knights will be disclosed in the future, please stay tuned!
  • The main boss Tyronoe creates a mirror-like Folded Realm in the trailer- can you explain what is a Folded Realm in the game?
    • The Folded Realm is a mysterious story element in Tides of Annihilation and Gwendolyn will encounter different types of these otherworldly realms throughout the game. Tyronoe is one of few characters that can travel between the human world and this Mirror Folded Realm she creates, and can make use of powerful magic energies from this Mirror Realm. More details of the Folded Realm will be revealed soon!
  • When is Tides of Annihilation launching on PC and consoles?
    • Tides of Annihilation will be releasing on PC, Xbox Series X|S, and PlayStation 5 consoles. A release date has not been announced at this time.

Tides of Annihilation will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store. A release date has yet to be announced.

Watch the trailer below. View the screenshots at the gallery.

“Break the Mirror” Gameplay Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/tides-of-annihilation-break-the-mirror-gameplay-trailer-screenshots
